info.description: This is the ESDC Backend API server.
info.title: ESDC Backend API

get.description: Retrieve all users - requires admin role

post.description: Create a new user - requires admin role

get.description: Get statistics about users - requires admin role

delete.description: Delete a user by ID - requires admin role

get.description: Get all items in the authenticated user's cart

post.description: Add a product to the authenticated user's cart

400.description: Invalid request data or insufficient stock

delete.description: Remove all items from the authenticated user's cart

put.description: Update the quantity of a specific cart item

400.description: Invalid request data or insufficient stock

delete.description: Remove a specific item from the cart

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password

get.description: Get all orders for the authenticated user with pagination

post.description: Create a new order with the specified items

400.description: Invalid request data or insufficient stock

get.description: Get a specific order by its ID for the authenticated user

401.description: User not authenticated or unauthorized access

get.description: Retrieve all posts - requires admin role
Get all products with optional filtering by category and search

parameters.description: Search term for name or description
parameters.name: search

get.description: Get a specific product by its ID

post.description: Create a new project with the provided data
Upload a single file of any type with max size 10MB

400.description: Invalid file or no file uploaded

post.description: Upload multiple files of any type with max size 10MB each

400.description: No files uploaded or failed to parse form

post.description: Upload a single image file (jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp) with max size 5MB

400.description: Invalid file or no file uploaded

get.description: Get all items in the authenticated user's wishlist

post.description: Add a product to the authenticated user's wishlist

delete.description: Remove a specific item from the wishlist

get.description: Establish WebSocket connection for real-time chat

description.example: This is a sample project description

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
